summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing of HACCP, Dipendenti, and Prima Nota Automation modules. All 26 backend API tests passed. All frontend UI tests passed for HACCP Dashboard, Temperature Frigoriferi/Congelatori, Sanificazioni, Scadenzario, Gestione Dipendenti, and Prima Nota with Automation panel.

issues: Some employee names are missing in the Nome column - only showing Codice Fiscale

critical_code_review_comments: All HACCP module endpoints working correctly with proper data validation
Dipendenti module has 22 employees loaded with proper CRUD operations
Prima Nota automation panel shows correct stats (662 cassa, 469 banca, 139 assegni)
Temperature conformity checking works correctly (0-4°C for frigo, -22 to -18°C for congelatori)
seed_data_creation: Test data created during backend tests with TEST_ prefix for HACCP temperature records, sanificazioni, scadenzario products, and dipendenti
context_for_next_testing_agent: All HACCP, Dipendenti, and Prima Nota features are working correctly. Backend APIs tested: HACCP Dashboard (/api/haccp-completo/dashboard), Temperature Frigoriferi/Congelatori CRUD and generation, Sanificazioni CRUD and generation, Scadenzario CRUD, Dipendenti CRUD with stats, Prima Nota Cassa/Banca CRUD, Prima Nota Automation stats and processing. Frontend pages load correctly with all buttons functional. Modal interactions work for adding/editing records. Temperature grids display correctly with color-coded conformity indicators.

haccp_temperature_frigoriferi.grid_display: PASS - Shows temperature grid with 3 frigoriferi
haccp_temperature_frigoriferi.cell_click_edit: PASS - Clicking cell opens edit modal

haccp_temperature_congelatori.grid_display: PASS - Shows temperature grid with 2 congelatori

haccp_sanificazioni.records_display: PASS - Shows records grouped by day

haccp_scadenzario.kpi_cards: PASS - Shows Scaduti and In Scadenza KPIs

gestione_dipendenti.stats_display: PASS - Shows Totale, Attivi, Libretti in Scadenza

prima_nota.saldo_cards: PASS - Shows Saldo Cassa, Saldo Banca, Totale Disponibile
